channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 55 Best Shows on Disney+ Right Now (September 2025)
item.description: Limitless, Ironheart, and Hurricane Katrina: Race Against Time are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

item.title: The iPhone Air is a hint at the iPhone’s future, which could include foldables
item.description: The iPhone Air may not be ready to be your daily driver, but it's a hint of what's to come.

item.title: Apple’s creator-centric iPhone 17 Pro will make the vlogging camera obsolete
item.description: Apple unveiled its new line of iPhones on Tuesday, and the iPhone 17 Pro is making a direct appeal to content creators.

item.title: Microsoft to lessen reliance on OpenAI by buying AI from rival Anthropic
item.description: The move to diversify its AI partnerships by tapping the shoulder of OpenAI’s top rival comes as the AI company also pursues independence from Microso...

item.title: Apple unveils Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and Watch SE 3
item.description: One perk is the Apple Watch Series 11 can alert you to possible hypertension. Apple says it plans to notify over 1 million people with undiagnosed hyp...

item.title: Apple Watch Series 11, Ultra 3, SE: Specs, Price, Release Date
item.description: Blood oxygen sensor controversies aside, improved battery life, new hypertension notifications, and the addition of satellite messaging are all good r...

item.title: I want to love Apple’s new iPhone Air, but the iPhone 17 is a better deal
item.description: I was within a heartbeat of preordering the new iPhone Air. But a closer looks at the specs changed my mind.

item.title: The iPhone 17 Series Gets the Biggest iPhone Design Refresh in Years
item.description: Apple’s thinnest iPhone Air brings with it a high price, and the redesigned iPhone 17 Pro features a telephoto camera that can zoom up to 8X.

item.title: Cindy Cohn Is Leaving the EFF, but Not the Fight for Digital Rights
item.description: After 25 years at the Electronic Frontier Foundation, Cindy Cohn is stepping down as executive director. In a WIRED interview, she reflects on encrypt...

item.title: Everything Apple Announced: iPhone Air, iPhone 17, Apple Watches, AirPods Pro 3
item.description: The iPhone 17 is here, along with a very thin iPhone Air. There are three new Apple watches to tell you how you're feeling, and a pair of AirPods Pro ...
